songs.title: Big Time Rush
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh Oh Ohhhh Ohhhhh
Oh Oh Ohhhh Ohhhhh
Oh Oh Ohhhh Ohhhhh

[Verse 1: Kendall]
Make it count
Play it straight
Don't look back
Don't hesitate
When you go big time!!!!

[Verse 2: James]
What you want
What you feel
Never quit
Make it real
When you roll big time!

[Chorus 1: Kendall]
Hey! (Oh) Hey! (Oh)

[Chorus 1: Carlos]
Listen to your heart now!
Hey! (Ohhhh) Hey! (Ohhhhh)

[Chorus 1: James]
Don't you feel the rush?
Hey! (Oh) Hey! (Oh)

[Verse 3: Logan]
Better take your shot now

Oh Oh Ohh Ohh
Oh Oh Ohh Ohh

[Chorus 2]
Go and shake it up!
What cha gotta lose?
Go and make your luck with the life you choose
If you want it all
Lay it on the line
It's the only life ya got
So ya gotta live it big time

Oh Oh Ohh Ohh
Oh Oh Ohh Ohh

[Verse 4: Carlos]
Step it up
Get in gear
Go for broke
Make it clear
Gotta go big time

[Verse 5: Logan]
Make it work
Get it right
Change the world over night
Gotta dream big time

[Chorus 1: Kendall]
Hey! (Oh) Hey! (Oh)

[Chorus 1: Carlos]
Give it all you got now!
Hey! (Ohhhh) Hey! (Ohhhhh)

[Chorus 1: James]
Isn't it a rush?
Hey! (Ohhhh) Hey! (Ohhhhh)

Finish what you start now

Oh Oh Ohh Ohh
Oh Oh Ohh Ohh

[Chorus 2]
Go and shake it up!
What cha gotta lose?
Go and make your luck with the life you choose
If you want it all
Lay it on the line
It's the only life ya got
So ya gotta live it big time

[Bridge: All]
Look around
Every light is shining now
It's brighter somehow
Look around
Nothings really as it seems
Nothing but dreams
You and I
Gonna make a brand new sound
Like we own this town

[Verse 6]
We can fly
Now our feet are off the ground
We'll never look down
Welcome to the big time
All the pretty people see you walking in the sunshine
Welcome to the good times
Life will never be the same

[Chorus 2]
Go and shake it up!
What cha gotta lose?
Go and make your luck with the life you choose
If you want it all
Lay it on the line
It's the only life ya got
So ya gotta live it big time

Oh Oh Ohh Ohh
Oh Oh Ohh Ohh

[Outro]
If you want it all
Lay it on the line
It's the only life ya got
So ya gotta live it big time
